MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G61 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.35AM. Our engineers are on their way to the local substation to investigate and repair the suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.15AM on 6th January 2021
